Package library.service

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
library.service.BookService
public class BookService extends Object
Service layer responsible for managing book-related operations.

This class provides core use cases for:

  • Adding books to the library collection
  • Searching books based on keywords
It represents the business logic of Sprint 1. The persistence details are handled by BookRepository. This class focuses only on application-level operations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lojain

    • search

      public List<Book> search(String keyword)
      Searches for books whose title, author, or ISBN match the given keyword.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
